comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: Another view of the same accident.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Read all about it - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/15002128?searchTerm=zig zag railway

comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content:
That's a great find beachcomberaustralia. What a detailed account! Lots of useful info in there.

Something worth consideration - if the accident happened on Tuesday 8 December 1908 at 7pm, then the above photo could not possibly have been taken on that day as it is in daylight. The photo must have been taken during the cleanup the day after on Wednesday 9 December. The date on the photo will be referencing the date of the accident, not the date the photo was taken.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
I was about to edit my post with just that point.! 
Yes, Trove really gives extra dimensions to these photos.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: Good observation about the daylight. We have changed the date to 9 December 1908
